DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine efficacy cognitive behavioral guide self-help training provide via internet tinnitus distress German sample .
DOC.detailed_description: Long wait period deficiency outpatient therapy stimulate development internet-based intervention variety mental disorder last year . A Swedish research group develop internet-based self-help training patient chronic tinnitus show promising result ( Andersson et al. , 2002 ; Kaldo et al. , 2007 ; Kaldo et al. , 2008 ) . This self-help training adapt German-speaking patient . The present study evaluate efficacy treatment randomize control trial conduct Germany . Further aim process evaluation treatment identification predictor efficacy .
DOC.criteria: Age least 18 year Chronic tinnitus least 6 month Medical examination tinnitus ear , nose throat physician ( ENT ) Scoring 38 Tinnitus Handicap Inventory ( THI ) score 13 MiniTinnitus Questionnaire ( MiniTQ ) Not currently receive psychological treatment tinnitus Being able access Internet print instruction Sufficient knowledge German language read follow Internetbased selfhelp program Tinnitus cause general medical condition otologic disease ( e.g. , active Meniere 's Disease ) Clinical diagnosis severe mental disorder ( especially severe depressive disorder , suicidality , acute psychosis ) Clinical diagnosis Dementia another severe organic cerebral disorder Clinical diagnosis substancerelated addiction/abuse
